rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
When Sintering Howl is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return target Aura card not named Sintering Howl from your graveyard to your hand.
Substantiate {1}{B}{G} [i](You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)[/i]
